mapper.select: select * from member where lv != '5' order by id;
select id from member where name = #{name} and phone=#{phone};
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, address, phone, birth) values(#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{address},#{phone},#{birth})
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, birth=#{birth}, state=#{state}, lv=#{lv}, money=#{money}, point=#{poiont} where id={id}
